quotes.text: Don’t let your past learning stop you from learning new things. It’s a simple trap because when we learn new things, the brain tries to associate them with familiar things (i.e. stuff you already know) and when the new concepts are too different or in contradiction with what you already know, this may lead to frustration.
quotes.author: Alex Ewerlöf

quotes.text: Haters are gonna hate, but in nature, the creatures that adapt survive.
quotes.author: Alex Ewerlöf

quotes.text: Here’s to the crazy ones, the misfits, the rebels, the troublemakers, the round pegs in the square holes... the ones who see things differently — they’re not fond of rules... You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them, but the only thing you can’t do is ignore them because they change things... they push the human race forward, and while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius, because the people who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Get going. Move forward. Aim high. Plan a takeoff. Don’t just sit on the runway and hope someone will come along and push the airplane. It simply won’t happen. Change your attitude and gain some altitude. Believe me, you’ll love it up here.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.text: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events, and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.text: The happiest man on earth would look into the mirror and see only himself, exactly how he is.
quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore of Harry Potter

quotes.text: It is not our abilities that show who we truly are. It is our choices.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.text: We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are.
quotes.author: Sirius Black of Harry Potter

quotes.text: Don’t let what-ifs get in your way. Just do. Just do something. Anything. And it might suck. But you’ll learn something. And that’s fine.
quotes.author: Alex Neuse

quotes.text: Talent, you have naturally. Skill is only developed by hours and hours and hours of beating on your craft.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.text: Sometimes life’s going to hit you in the head with a brick. Don’t lose faith. I’m convinced that the only thing that kept me going was that I loved what I did.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If you live each day as it was your last, someday you’ll most certainly be right.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: You can’t connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Details matter. It’s worth waiting to get it right.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: When I was 17, I read a quote that went something like: ’If you live each day as if it was your last, someday you’ll most certainly be right.’ It made an impression on me, and since then, for the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: ’If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?’ And whenever the answer has been ’No’ for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: You have to trust in something — your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: When you grow up, you tend to get told that the world is the way it is and your life is just to live your life inside the world. Try not to bash into the walls too much, try to have a nice family life, have fun, save a little money. That’s a very limited life. Life can be much broader once you discover one simple fact: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people that were no smarter than you. And you can change it, you can influence it… Once you learn that, you’ll never be the same again.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Focusing is about saying ’No.’
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: People think focus means saying yes to the thing you’ve got to focus on. But that’s not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully. I’m actually as proud of the things we haven’t done as the things I have done. Innovation is saying no to 1,000 things.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Getting fired from Apple was the best thing that could have ever happened to me. The heaviness of being successful was replaced by the lightness of being a beginner again, less sure about everything. It freed me to enter one of the most creative periods of my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Don’t feel stupid if you don’t like what everyone else pretends to love.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.text: I like books that aren’t just lovely but that have memories in themselves. Just like playing a song, picking up a book again that has memories can take you back to another place or another time.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.text: Don’t be trapped by dogma — which is living with the results of other people’s thinking.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: We don’t get a chance to do that many things, and every one should be really excellent. Because this is our life. Life is brief, and then you die, you know? And we’ve all chosen to do this with our lives. So it better be damn good. It better be worth it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: We’re here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: My job is not to be easy on people. My job is to take these great people we have and to push them and make them even better.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: What a computer is to me is the most remarkable tool that we have ever come up with. It’s the equivalent of a bicycle for our minds.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: I’d been rejected, but I was still in love, so I decided to start over.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.text: Somebody once said, ’If you took all the money in the world, divided it up equally among everybody, it would soon all be back in the same pockets.’
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: I’m learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I’m doing.
quotes.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

quotes.text: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D’Angelo

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Follow your own passion—not your parents’, not your teachers’ — yours.
quotes.author: Robert Ballard

quotes.text: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.text: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: The first step is you have to say that you can.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: Don't ever let someone tell you, you can't do something. Not even me. You got a dream, you got to protect it. People can’t do something themselves, they want to tell you you can’t do it. You want something, go get it. Period.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: There’s no reason to have a plan B because it distracts from plan A.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: I wake up every morning believing today is going to be better than yesterday.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: You don’t set out to build a wall. You don’t say ’I’m going to build the biggest, baddest, greatest wall that’s ever been built.’ You don’t start there. You say, ’I’m going to lay this brick as perfectly as a brick can be laid.’ You do that every single day. And soon you have a wall.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: The things that have been most valuable to me I did not learn in school.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: Don’t chase the paper. Chase the dream.
quotes.author: P. Diddy

quotes.text: If I’d had some set idea of a finish line, don’t you think I would have crossed it years ago?
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Don’t compare yourself with anyone in this world. If you do so, you are insulting yourself.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: If you are born poor, it’s not your mistake. But if you die poor, it’s your mistake.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you’ll end up working for one.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: That’s been one of my mantras — focus and simplicity. Simple can be harder than complex; you have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The more I see, the less I know for sure.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ’happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: One day or day one. You decide.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don’t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: The best way of learning about anything is by doing.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.text: A dream doesn’t become reality through magic. It takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it’s within your reach. And it’ll be worth every minute you spend alone at night, thinking and thinking about what it is you want to design or build.
quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

quotes.text: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life – think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity successful men act as though they have accomplished or are enjoying something. Soon it becomes a reality. Act, look, feel successful, conduct yourself accordingly, and you will be amazed at the positive results.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Let me tell you something you already know. The world ain’t all sunshine and rainbows. It is a very mean and nasty place and it will beat you to your knees and keep you there permanently if you let it. You, me, or nobody is gonna hit as hard as life. But it ain’t how hard you hit; it’s about how hard you can get hit, and keep moving forward. How much you can take, and keep moving forward. That’s how winning is done. Now, if you know what you’re worth, then go out and get what you’re worth. But you gotta be willing to take the hit, and not pointing fingers saying you ain’t where you are because of him, or her, or anybody. Cowards do that and that ain’t you. You’re better than that!
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.text: Nobody owes nobody nothing. You owe yourself.
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.text: Cause if you’re willing to go through all the battling you got to go through to get where you want to get, who’s got the right to stop you? I mean maybe some of you guys got something you never finished, something you really want to do, something you never said to someone, something…and you’re told no, even after you paid your dues? Who’s got the right to tell you that, who? Nobody! It’s your right to listen to your gut, it ain’t nobody’s right to say no after you earned the right to be where you want to be and do what you want to do!
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.text: You only get one shot at life, and that means you must follow your passion.
quotes.author: Brian Robben

quotes.text: Do what you love and the necessary resources will follow.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.text: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: I like to build things. I like to do things. I am having a lot of fun.
quotes.author: Walter Chrysler

quotes.text: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Desire! That’s the one secret of every man’s career. Not education. Not being born with hidden talents. Desire.
quotes.author: Bobby Unser

quotes.text: Earning happiness means doing good and working, not speculating and being lazy. Laziness may look inviting, but only work gives you true satisfaction.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Passion will move men beyond themselves, beyond their shortcomings, beyond their failures.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn’t matter to me… Going to bed at night saying we’ve done something wonderful… that’s what matters to me.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Be willing to go all out, in pursuit of your dream. Ultimately it will pay off. You are more powerful than you think you are. Go for it.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: It has been said, most people die at age 25 and don’t get buried until they are 65. Make an effort to live your life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: You have to be willing to allow the person you are today to DIE so that you can give birth to the person you are meant to become.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Other people’s opinion of you does not have to become your reality.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: The graveyard is the richest place on earth, because it is here that you will find all the hopes and dreams that were never fulfilled, the books that were never written, the songs that were never sung, the inventions that were never shared, the cures that were never discovered, all because someone was too afraid to take that first step, keep with the problem, or determined to carry out their dream.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: Align yourself with people that you can learn from, people who want more out of life, people who are stretching and searching, and seeking some higher ground in life.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: You take on the responsibility for making your dream a reality.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: There are winners, there are losers, and there are people who have not yet learned how to win.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you’re in control of your life. If you don’t, life controls you.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Leaders spend 5% of their time on the problem & 95% of their time on the solution. Get over it & crush it!
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: One reason so few of us achieve what we truly want is that we never direct our focus; we never concentrate our power. Most people dabble their way through life, never deciding to master anything in particular.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Your life changes the moment you make a new, congruent, and committed decision.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: If you want to be successful, find someone who has achieved the results you want and copy what they do and you’ll achieve the same results.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: I challenge you to make your life a masterpiece. I challenge you to join the ranks of those people who live what they teach, who walk their talk.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Nothing has any power over me other than that which I give it through my conscious thoughts.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Create a vision and never let the environment, other people’s beliefs, or the limits of what has been done in the past shape your decisions.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: It’s what you practice in private that you will be rewarded for in public.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Your income right now is a result of your standards, it is not the industry, it is not the economy.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Once you have mastered time, you will understand how true it is that most people overestimate what they can accomplish in a year – and underestimate what they can achieve in a decade.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Remember, rewards come in action, not in discussion.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: People who succeed at the highest level are not lucky; they’re doing something differently than everyone else.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn’t trying.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Someone else is happy with less than what you have.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Whatever you consistently think about and focus upon, you move toward.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Everyday, stand guard at the door of your mind, and you alone decide what thoughts and beliefs you let into your life. For they will shape whether you feel rich or poor, cursed or blessed.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Repetition is the mother of skill.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: It’s a lie to think you’re not good enough. It’s a lie to think you’re not worth anything.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.text: Have you ever felt trapped in circumstances, then discovered that the only trap was your own lack of vision, lack of courage, or failure to see that you had better options?
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.text: Don’t wish it was easier, wish you were better. Don’t wish for less problems, wish for more skills. Don’t wish for less challenges, wish for more wisdom.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Get around people who have something of value to share with you. Their impact will continue to have a significant effect on your life long after they have departed.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: You must either modify your dreams or magnify your skills.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have 24 hour days.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Success occurs when opportunity meets preparation.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: You were born to win, but to be a winner you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: If you don’t see yourself as a winner, then you cannot perform as a winner.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Don’t wait for your feelings to change to take the action. Take the action and your feelings will change.
quotes.author: Barbara Baron

quotes.text: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.text: You’ve got to follow your passion. You’ve got to figure out what it is you love — who you really are. And have the courage to do that. I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Follow your instincts. That is where true wisdom manifests itself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses.
quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

quotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines, sail away from the safe harbour, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Work like hell. I mean you just have to put in 80 to 100 hour weeks every week. This improves the odds of success. If other people are putting in 40 hour workweeks and you’re putting in 100 hour workweeks, then even if you’re doing the same thing, you know that you will achieve in four months what it takes them a year to achieve.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: You need to literally pick up your video game machine, smash it to pieces, walk out your house, get in your car, and go live in your car. Go somewhere. Go check in to a homeless shelter. You need to shake up your life like it’s never been shaken up before.
quotes.author: Elliott Hulse

quotes.text: Throw yourself off a cliff, and learn how to fly on the way down.
quotes.author: Elliott Hulse

quotes.text: Elliott speaks the truth. You want a change in your life? Get rid of the distractions and the laws of the universe will allow you to fill the void with something constructive to focus on and be successful at, which requires time to master. That is the point of this video as I understand it.
quotes.author: Blake Lynch

quotes.text: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Pain is temporary. It may last for a minute, or an hour or a day, or even a year. But eventually, it will subside. And something else takes its place. If I quit, however, it will last forever.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Avoid being your own enemy.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Sometimes, it ain’t about being the most talented. Sometimes it ain’t about being the smartest. Sometimes it’s not even about working the hardest. Sometimes it’s about consistency! Consistency!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: If you’re not where you are, if you’re not where you want to be, if you don’t have what you want, want to have, if you’re not where you think you should be at this particular place, it has nothing to do with the system. But it has everything to do with the fact that you’re not making the sacrifice.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: The only way to get out of mediocrity is to keep shooting for excellence.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: I’ve been trying to tell y’all, its’s not your circumstances or situation that determines if you’re gonna be successful or not. I’ve been telling you, it’s your mindset! It’s the way you see it. It’s the way you think it right!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Everybody has a dream, but not everybody has a grind.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Winners focus on winning. Losers focus on winners.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: You can’t cheat the grind. It knows hows much you’ve invested. It won’t give you nothing you haven’t worked for.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Stop being average. You’re not even good. You were born to be great.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Stop whining. Start grinding.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Be stronger than your excuses.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: When you’re great, you attract great. When you’re average, you attract average!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Where you are is temporary. You will not be there for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Other people couldn’t see it. A lot of people didn’t believe it. You were attacked. You were criticised. People were opposing you but you kept on doing it. It was hard. It was rough. It was difficult. But to you, it was worth it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Say this to yourself everyday: I can write my own book. I can have my own business. I can take the trip and travel around the world. It’s possible. I can bounce back from adversity and reinvent my life. It’s possible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: See, experience is cheap. All it takes is time. Skill is harder, but really only requires hard work — a lot of people can get that. But attitude. You either have it, or you don’t. The right sort of person is so passionate about coding, they can’t be stopped from doing it.
quotes.author: David Barrett

quotes.text: Success leaves clues. People who succeed at the highest level are doing something differently than everyone else does.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins‏

quotes.text: Don’t wait for someone to educate you. Educate yourself.
quotes.author: English with Lucy‏

quotes.text: I have to face life with a newly found passion. I must rediscover the irresistible will to learn, to live and to love.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.text: If you feel like there’s something out there that you’re supposed to be doing, if you have a passion for it, then stop wishing and just do it.
quotes.author: Wanda Sykes

quotes.text: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.text: A great leader’s courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: If you can’t figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
quotes.author: Bishop T.D. Jakes

quotes.text: Chase your passion, not your pension.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: Only passions, great passions, can elevate the soul to great things.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.text: Chase down your passion like it’s the last bus of the night.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.text: You can’t fake passion.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.text: You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right. If you’re not passionate enough from the start, you’ll never stick it out.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Just don’t give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there’s love and inspiration, I don’t think you can go wrong.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.text: We’re the creators of our own experience — remembering this, and living our lives from this perspective, empowers us.
quotes.author: Mike Robbins

quotes.text: You create opportunities by performing, not complaining.
quotes.author: Muriel Siebert

quotes.text: Working hard for something we don’t care about is called stress; Working hard for something we love is called passion.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: We’re not born to pay bills all of our life and then die. Follow your passion relentlessly.
quotes.author: TheNetNinja

quotes.text: Everyone gets discouraged. But it’s through these times that will show have bad you really want it.
quotes.author: Chris Sean

quotes.text: Positive action is the best way to put your mistakes in the past.
quotes.author: Marie Forleo

quotes.text: If you are not doing what you love, you are wasting your time.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: It’s supposed to be hard. If it were easy, everyone would do it.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks in A League of Their Own

quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The universe reveals its secrets to those who dare to follow their hearts.
quotes.author: Ralph Smart

quotes.text: If you have ever tried to increase your income, or magnify your spiritual clarity, you know that the world will test you. Only through your persistence, fearlessness, and loving service does the world yield to your efforts.
quotes.author: The Way Of The Superior Man

quotes.text: Doubt is only removed by action. If you’re not working then that’s where doubt comes in.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: I believe in myself so much that nothing is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: I keep having vivid dreams of success. Then it’s time to sleep.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: The more you seek the uncomfortable the more you will become comfortable.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: I stay ready so I don’t have to get ready.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: There’s no talent here, this is hard work. This is an obsession. Talent does not exist, we are all human beings. You could be anyone if you put in the time. You will reach the top, and that’s that. I am not talented, I am obsessed.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: Always look to learn. Learning something new is a great feeling. The feeling of progress.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: Nothing good ever comes from worrying or sitting there feeling sorry for yourself... keep positive and keep pushing on and things will turn good.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: It’s a tough pill to swallow but we can either run from our adversity or run to our adversity, tale it head on and conquer it.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: I wish everyone well, but you need to focus on yourself. You need to stop putting your hand out. Everyone wants handouts. Everyone wants things for free. You’ve got to put in the world, you’ve got to grind, you’ve got to go through the struggle, and you’ve got to get it.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: Love your family, work super hard, live your passion.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: It took thirty-eight years before 50 million people gained access to radios. It took television thirteen years to earn an audience that size. It took Instagram a year and a half.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Passion is an unmatched fuel. Add being happy to that and you have a wonderful formula for good health.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Wake up before everybody else and work into the night. Hustle
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: You have to understand your own personal DNA. Don’t do things because I do them or Steve Jobs or Mark Cuban tried it. You need to know your personal brand and stay true to it.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: You must choose an area where you can win. No, scratch that. Not just win, but absolutely dominate. After all, don’t we have enough mediocre podcasts around?
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Time – the one asset none of us are ever going to get more of.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Effort is grossly underrated.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: The best marketing strategy ever: care.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Stop whining. Start hustling.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Content is king, but marketing is queen, and runs the household.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Recognise that you have a much bigger chance and a better opportunity than your parents did to build a business around your passion and don’t take that for granted.
Recognize that you have a much bigger chance and a better opportunity than your parents did to build a business around your passion and don’t take that for granted.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: No one is going to come to your house and make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.text: Whatever you want, go all in and dominate, learn it, eat it, sleep it, breath it and believe it.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone
